import { useState } from 'react'; import './Counter.css' export default function Counter(){ const [count,setCount] = useState(0); function incrementCounterFunction(){ setCount(count+1) } function incrementCounterFunctionTwo(){ setCount(count+2) } function decrementCounterFunction(){ setCount(count-1) } function decrementCounterFunctionTwo(){ setCount(count-2) } return(
{count}
) }
